Articles.Content:
Single stage to Laythe, and back... With a VTOL. With antimatter. Such hacks, much wow.

Tested with NEAR.

![447a5270af.jpg](http://puu.sh/geXaB/447a5270af.jpg)

She has about 19500 m/s dV available in vacuum and infinite amounts in atmosphere. You do need to refuel her with antimatter before turning on horizontal engines (hyperedit haxxxx may have been used).

Action groups:

1: Turn on VTOL mode.

2. Turn on plane mode

3. Toggle air brakes

4. Toggle thermal turbojet propellant

If you try flying this, you need to turn on both RCS and SAS on takeoff. The RCS controls compressed air nozzles that keep you from interacting with the ground.

Mods required:

B9

KAS

KSP-I

(Maybe something else?)
